name: 胡貝
objective:
本課程為車輛、機械工程科系背景之同學設之計普通物理課程，使大一新生能銜接中學的物理課程至未來專業的領域。課程內容上學期包含牛頓力學、功與能、轉動，和流體力學、熱力學概論；下學期含有庫倫定律、電磁學、光學及近代物理。課程每週三小時，連續教授二個學期。
This course is designed for students of vehicle and/or mechanical engineering background, so that freshmen can connect the physics course of middle school to the future professional field. The first semester includes Newtonian mechanics, work and energy, rotation, and introduction to fluid mechanics and thermodynamics; the second semester includes Coulomb's law, electromagnetism, optics and modern physics. The course lasts three hours a week for two consecutive semesters.
schedule:
W1: Introduction 
W2: Motion along a straight line
W3: Motion in 2 and 3 Dimensions
W4: Newton’s First and Second Laws
W5: Applying Newton’s Laws
W6: Work and Kinetic Energy 
W7: Potential Energy and Conservation of Energy 
W8: Momentum and Kinetic Energy in Collisions
W9: Midterm Exam
W10~W13: Rotation, Rolling, Torque, and Angular Momentum
W14~W15: Oscillations and Waves
W16~17: Temperature, Heat and the first law of thermodynamics
W18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考：30%
期末考：30%
作業 / 小測驗：30%
其他: 10%
